headline: Can PG's Productivity Drive Fuel EPS Gains Amid Inflation?
summary: Procter & Gamble depends on productivity from cost savings to supply-chain efficiencies to protect margins and support EPS as inflation pressures persist.

headline: What Recent Developments Mean For The Church & Dwight CHD Investment Story
summary: Church & Dwight’s latest research update trims fair value only slightly, from US$97.26 to US$95.84 per share, as analysts bake a softer consumer backdrop and more restrained pricing power into their 2026 assumptions. The discount rate stays effectively unchanged at about 6.96%, while revenue growth expectations ease just a touch from 3.03% to 3.00%, signaling a more cautious but still measured view on the stock. headline: A Look At Church & Dwight (CHD) Valuation After Recent Share Price Strength
summary: Why Church & Dwight is on investors’ radar today Church & Dwight (CHD) has drawn fresh attention after recent share price moves, with the stock last closing at $90.61. headline: Church & Dwight: Quality Business Is Facing Some Challenges
summary: Church & Dwight (CHD) trades at 25x earnings despite muted growth. I remain cautious pending clarity on organic growth. See more here.
